results.content: 在家里时，请独自住在一个房间内。如果可以，请单独使用一间厕所来减少与其他人的接触。如果你和其他人共用同一间厕所，使用前后需要消毒。

phrase.content: Stay in a separate room at home. It is best if the room has an attached bathroom. This is to reduce contact with the other members of the house. If you are using a shared bathroom, the bathroom needs to be cleaned before or after you use it.

results.romanized: zài jiā lǐ shí ， qǐng dú zì zhù zài yī gè fáng jiān nèi 。 rú guǒ kě yǐ ， qǐng dān dú shǐ yòng yī jiān cè suǒ lái jiǎn shǎo yǔ qí tā rén de jiē hóng 。 rú guǒ nǐ hé qí tā rén gòng yòng tóng yī jiān cè suǒ ， shǐ yòng qián hòu xū yào xiāo dú 。

results.content: 请要求他人为您定时准备食物、水和其他日常用品，将它们放置在您的房门外，好让您可以把它们带进房内

phrase.content: Arrange for food, water, and other supplies to be placed outside your room. You yourself have to bring those items into your room.

results.romanized: qǐng yào qíu tā rén wèi nín dìng shí zhǔn bèi shí wù 、 shǔi hé qí tā rì cháng yòng pǐn ， jiāng tā men fàng zhì zài nín de fáng mén wài ， hǎo ràng nín kě yǐ bǎ tā men dài jìn fáng nèi

results.content: 直到您的检测结果为阴性前，请减少您与其他家人（尤其是年幼和年长人士）的近距离接触。

phrase.content: Until you know your swab test results, reduce your contact with family members. Especially, try not to get near older people.

results.romanized: zhí dào nín de jiǎn cè jié guǒ wèi yīn xìng qián ， qǐng jiǎn shǎo nín yǔ qí tā jiā rén （ yóu qí shì nián yòu hé nián cháng rén shì ） de jìn jù lí jiē hóng 。
